Another approach is data driven, which is used bottom up approach which is used in example which I was just showing in machine learning where there is a data and we have some vague class of models and then we try to build a model based on the data based on the evidence we have.

And then there is collaborative approach which is getting more and more popular, which is can be said to be socially driven where we have a large amount of people, each contributing a small amount of information.
